breakpointName.description: String variable to bind the component’s breakpoint property to the breakpoint variable from the 🌈 [platform] Appearances Library. Learn more in the documentation https://design.accor.com/latest/get-started/designing/using-templates/guide-6MiFCQRw#section-adding-components-e7

2xs.description: Minimal icons for dense interfaces or inline text elements.

sm.description: Standard small icons for UI controls and navigation

md.description: Medium icons for primary actions and content areas

lg.description: Large icons for featured content and prominent actions

xl.description: Extra large icons for hero sections and primary features

2xl.description: ery large icons for major interface elements

max.description: Maximum size icons for splash screens and brand elements

xs.description: Small accent icons, typically used within form elements

sm.description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

2xl.description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

lg.description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

xl.description: The dynamic inline space tokens provide responsive spacing values for inline elements.

lg-h.description: The dynamic insetSquish space tokens provide responsive spacing values for non homogeneous padding elements - resulting in a visually squished layout. Ratio: 3:1 horizontal emphasis

lg-v.description: The dynamic insetSquish space tokens provide responsive spacing values for non homogeneous padding elements - resulting in a visually squished layout. Ratio: 3:1 horizontal emphasis

md-h.description: The dynamic insetSquish space tokens provide responsive spacing values for non homogeneous padding elements - resulting in a visually squished layout. Ratio: 1.5:1 horizontal emphasis

sm.description: Minimim space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

lg.description: Large space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

xl.description: Extra large space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

2xl.description: Twice extra large space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

3xl.description: Maximum space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

md.description: Standard space applied only on the top and/or bottom of an element that dynamically varies from one breakpoint to another.

2xl.description: Double extra large spacing for major section breaks

2xs.description: Hairline spacing for very tight layouts

lg.description: Large spacing for comfortable reading and interaction

md.description: Medium spacing for standard inline layouts

sm.description: Small spacing for compact groups and navigation

xl.description: Extra large spacing for clear visual separation

xs.description: Minimal spacing between closely related elements

3xl.description: Triple extra large spacing for prominent separation

4xl.description: Quadruple extra large spacing for hero sections

5xl.description: Five times extra large spacing for dramatic separation

6xl.description: Six times extra large spacing for maximum emphasis

2xs-h.description: minimum horizontal padding. Ratio: 2:1 horizontal emphasis

2xs-v.description: Minimum vertical padding. Ratio: 2:1 horizontal emphasis

lg-h.description: Large horizontal padding. Ratio: 1.25:1 horizontal emphasis

lg-v.description: Large vertical padding. Ratio: 1.25:1 horizontal emphasis

md-h.description: Standard horizontal padding. Ratio: 1.33:1 horizontal emphasis

md-v.description: Standard vertical padding. Ratio: 1.33:1 horizontal emphasis

sm-h.description: Small horizontal padding. Ratio: 2:1 horizontal emphasis

sm-v.description: Small vertical padding. Ratio: 2:1 horizontal emphasis

xl-h.description: maximum horizontal padding. Ratio: 1.5:1 horizontal emphasis

xl-v.description: maximum vertical padding. Ratio: 1.5:1 horizontal emphasis

xs-h.description: Extra small horizontal padding. Ratio: 1.5:1 horizontal emphasis

xs-v.description: Extra small vertical padding. Ratio: 1.5:1 horizontal emphasis

lg-h.description: Large horizontal padding. Ratio: 1:1.33 vertical emphasis

lg-v.description: Large vertical padding. Ratio: 1:1.33 vertical emphasis

md-h.description: Standard horizontal padding. Ratio: 1:2 vertical emphasis

md-v.description: Standard vertical padding. Ratio: 1:2 vertical emphasis

sm-h.description: Small horizontal padding. Ratio: 1:1.5 vertical emphasis

sm-v.description: Small vertical padding. Ratio: 1:1.5 vertical emphasis

xs-h.description: Minimum horizontal padding. Ratio: 1:1.33 vertical emphasis

xs-v.description: Minimum vertical padding. Ratio: 1:1.33 vertical emphasis

2xl.description: maximum uniform padding for major containers

2xs.description: Extra small uniform padding for tight layouts

lg.description: Comfortable uniform padding for content areas

md.description: Standard uniform padding for most UI components

sm.description: Small uniform internal spacing for small containers

xl.description: Large uniform padding for spacious layouts

xs.description: Small uniform padding for compact components

min.description: Minimal uniform internal padding for very compact elements

Twice extra large generic value (24px).  Use this token if the system doesn't provide you a natural one suited for your need.

2xl.description: Extra large vertical spacing for major content divisions

2xs.description: Minimal vertical spacing between tightly related elements

lg.description: Comfortable vertical spacing for grouped content

md.description: Standard vertical spacing between related elements

sm.description: Small vertical spacing for compact layouts

xl.description: Large vertical spacing for distinct content sections

xs.description: Very small vertical gaps between closely related items

3xl.description: Maximum vertical spacing for significant content separation

withinPage.description: Standard spacing between major page sections.

withinSection-md.description: Medium spacing within sections for standard groupings.

withinSection-lg.description: Large spacing within sections for loose groupings.

withinSection-sm.description: Small spacing within sections for tight groupings.

withinSection-xl.description: Extra large spacing within sections for maximum separation.

afterHeader.description: Spacing after the main page header.
